body.name: VAKYOU Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 33Kpa Brushless Motor Stick Vacuum with LED Screen 450W Vacuum Cleaner 7 * 2500mAh Rechargeable Lightweight Handheld Vacuum 55mins Runtime
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 35 mins
features: 【Upgraded Powerful Sunction】VAKYOU cordless vacuum cleaner features 450W upgraded brushless motor, provides powerful suction for 33Kpa on max mode, captures pet hair, cat litter, pet food, and other messes on the hardwood floor, low-pile carpet, stairs, bed, curtain, furniture, car, RV, etc.In addition,our floor brush has the capacity of current induction in the automatic mode which will swith to different currents automatically in different objects such as the smooth floor and carpet to achieve the best cleaning effect for you.

【Versatile cleaning 10-in-1】The vacuum cleaner provide four different tools---long crevice tool, Led roller brush and 2 in 1 Upholster Brush,1* Hose.Maneuverable 150° swivels sideways and 90°up and down enables you to easily clean the blind corners under furniture. The 2 in 1 bush, long crevice or hose can be switched into a handheld vacuum to pick up debris on/in the desk or in the gap.Upgraded 6 LED lights help cordless vacuum cleaner to illuminate every dark corner and track dirt.

【55mins Long-Lasting Runtime】The stick vacuum cleaner is equipped with a 7-cell 2500 mAh large rechargeable and a detachable battery that can run for 55 minutes on standard mode and 15minutes on max mode.Three suction modes are provided for you to different occassions and time.No worry about the using time as we upgraded the vacuum with a touchable LED screen to let know well of the battery situation and vacumm health condition.

【6 Stages High-efficiency Filtration】With 6 stages fully sealed cyclone filtration system, the vacuum cleaner cordless captures 99.99% of fine particles as small as 0.1um and offers powerful centrifugal force to efficiently separate dirt. This rechargeable vacuum cordless provides the ultimate purified air and an excellent cleaning experience for every user. Note：the filter is washable. Regular cleaning of the filter/sponge will prevent weak suction and blockage.

【Humanized Design】The main motor of hardwood floor vacuum only weighs 3.2lb, extremely suitable for one-hand cleaning.It can be used by hand directly or telescopic tube by The retractable telescopic tube, adjusting from 21.8 inches to 31.5 inches, is in line with ergonomics. We also spray paint on the tube to light the colour which should be the first choice for gifts between relatives and friends. Wall mount or upright storage ways, effectively save space and more convenient for your life.We aslo expand the dustbin to 1.5 L large and one-key to realease the rubbish.No need to worry about dirting your hand.

【What You Will Get】1* Powerful Vacuum Cleaner Motor, 1* Long Crevice Tool, 1* Led Roller Brush ,1* 2 in 1 Upholster Brush, 1* Telescopic tube ,1* Cleaning Brush ,1* Hose,1* Adapter ,2* HEPA filter(We send you an extra HEPA) ,1* Wall Mount（with accessories）, 1* 24 Monthes Warranty

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgraded Powerful Sunction VAKYOU cordless vacuum cleaner features 450W upgraded brushless motor, provides powerful suction for 33Kpa on max mode Versatile Cleaning 10-in-1 The vacuum cleaner provide four different brushes---long crevice tool，Led roller brush , 2 in 1 Upholster Brush, hose. 55mins Long-Lasting Runtime The stick vacuum cleaner is equipped with a 7-cell 2500 mAh large rechargeable and a detachable battery that can run for 55 minutes on standard mode and 15 minutes on max mode. LED screen Three suction modes are provided for you to different occassions and time.No worry about the using time as we upgraded the vacuum with a touchable LED screen to let know well of the battery situation and vacumm health condition. Humanized Design The retractable telescopic tube, adjusting from 21.8 inches to 31.5 inches, is in line with ergonomics.We aslo expand the dustbin to 1.5 L large and one-key to realease the rubbish.No need to worry about dirting your hand.We also spray paint on the tube to light the colour which should be the first choice for gifts between relatives and friends. Wall mount or upright storage ways, effectively save space and more convenient for your life. 6 Stages High-efficiency Filtration With 6 stages fully sealed cyclone filtration system, the vacuum cleaner cordless captures 99.99% of fine particles as small as 0.1um and offers powerful centrifugal force to efficiently separate dirt. This rechargeable vacuum cordless provides the ultimate purified air and an excellent cleaning experience for every user.

The filter is washable. Regular cleaning of the filter/sponge will prevent weak suction and blockage. Note:There are inlet HEPA and outlet HEPA in the vacuum and we send 1 extra inlet HEPA for you to use. Suggestion: We suggest to wash the filter every three month.But if you use the vacuum cleaner by max mode everyday,wash it every month can ensure the powerful suction. Just one click of the button under the dustbin to empty the trash to avoid getting your hands dirty. You can charge the stick vacuum directly or simply charge the separate part. With Overcharge protection design, you can charge the vacuum overnight.

Clean Every Corner of Your Home The vacuum captures pet hair, cat litter, pet food, and other messes on the hardwood floor, low-pile carpet, stairs, bed, curtain, furniture, car, RV, etc.In addition,our floor brush has the capacity of current induction in the automatic mode which will swith to different currents automatically in different objects such as the smooth floor and carpet to achieve the best cleaning effect for you.Maneuverable 150° swivels sideways and 90°up and down enables you to easily clean the blind corners under furniture. The 2 in 1 bush or long crevice can be switched into a handheld vacuum to pick up debris on the desk or in the gap and we add a hose for the dust in the drew which can also longer or bend to some uneasy corner.Upgraded 6 LED lights help cordless vacuum cleaner to illuminate every dark corner and track dirt.
Motor 450W Max Suction 33KPA Battery Capacity 7*2500mAh Suction Modes 3(Optional)+1(Auto) Extra Hepa Filter Yes LED Display Yes Run Time 15-55mins Number of Battery Cells 7 Dust Cup 1.5L Cordless Yes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Cleaning with good attachments
reviews.reviewText: I must say it has revolutionized my cleaning routine. This compact and powerful cleaning tool has exceeded my expectations in every way.First and foremost, the cordless feature is a game-changer. Say goodbye to tangled cords and limited reach. With this vacuum cleaner, I can effortlessly clean every corner of my home without any restrictions. The battery life is impressive, providing ample cleaning time before needing a recharge.The suction power of this vacuum cleaner is remarkable. It effortlessly sucks up dirt, dust, and even pet hair from various surfaces, including carpets, hardwood floors, and upholstery. The multi-surface cleaning capability makes it versatile and suitable for any room in the house.Overall, this Vacuum Cleaner is a top-notch cleaning companion. Its convenience, power, and versatility make it a must-have for any household. I highly recommend this vacuum cleaner to anyone seeking a hassle-free and efficient cleaning experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and efficient
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We got new floors so I was looking for a new vacuum that was cordless that I could quickly use. This was perfect for what I needed it for. We have 7 kids and 4 large dogs so I vacuum and sweep daily but I don't like busting out the full size vacuum which doesn't fit under the tables and chairs. Came well packed in foam and the battery was even sealed. Also comes with extra filters in addition to the hepa filter. Everything comes apart for easy cleaning. It has 4 suction settings auto, low, medium, and high. All very quite compared to a full size vacuum. It's lightweight enough the kids can easily use it. Came with attachments that easily click into the wall mount which came with wall anchors and screws so it was super easy to attach to the wall. The battery came with a partial charge so it only took about 20 mins to reach full battery. You can charge the battery attached or detached from the vacuum. The lights make it super easy to see when it's fully charged. The screen is easy to read while using to see battery life and suction speed, I liked auto the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, sleek looking vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Everyone is on the Dyson hype, but the prices aren't affordable. I saw this one and for the price, it works really well. The battery came with half charge, so I gave it a quick try. There's 3 speeds, and even at the lowest, it picked up all the little crumbs from my hardwood floor. It's a bonus point that it comes with attachments to turn it into a handheld vacuum. It looks very nice and the material does not feel flimsy. The dust bin is medium size but that's not a deal breaker for me, since I can just easily empty it and keep cleaning. I will update soon if anything goes wrong.Update #2:I'm VERY impressed! If put on the auto setting, it changes suction power depending on the surface it's cleaning. Also comes with a washable HEPA filter. The suction power is measured as 33Kpa (kilo pascals) which is more than the average vacuum, usually being 20 Kpa. For the price, this is unreal! Battery takes about 4 hours to be fully charged, but that doesn't affect me.UPDATE #3I've had it for a few months now. No complaints! Great vacuum!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful, Lightweight, and Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: I'm so glad I bought this cordless vacuum cleaner! It's lightweight and easy to maneuver, and the suction is amazing. My house is a combination of hardwood floors and area rugs, and this vacuum has been great for both. It picks up all the dirt and debris, even pet hair. The battery life is also great - I can vacuum my entire house on a single charge. I highly recommend this vacuum cleaner to anyone looking for a powerful, cordless option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The floor attachment broke in less than 6 months
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I would NOT recommend this vacuum. The floor attachment developed a short in less than 6 months or normal use. I have only gone through 2 filters because I really don’t use it that much, but as you can see in the video the floor attachment shorts out during normal vacuuming. I also don’t vacuum carpet with it so it is not like it has had to work very hard. Don’t waste your money. I bought a Tineco and that lasted me over 2 years so a better value in my opinion.

Meines Erachtens bietet der leicht zu bedienende und sehr wendige Staubsauger ein ausgezeichnetes Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis.Nach nunmehr 14 Tagen im fast täglichen Einsatz hat der Staubsauger seine Aufgaben stets gut erledigt. Die drei Saugstufen und der Automatikmodus, der die Saugleistung an die Bodenbeschaffenheit anpasst, vereinfachen die tägliche Arbeit mit dem VAKYOU VC001 – zudem vereinfachen die Leuchtdioden am Bürstenkopf das Erfassen von Schmutz sehr. Die Walzenbürste arbeitet auf Marmor, Teppich, Laminat und PVC gleichermaßen gut und wird durch eine 2-in-1-Bürste sehr gut ergänzt.Der große Staubbehälter kann mit einem einfachen Klick geleert werden, ohne, dass man mit dem Inhalt in Kontakt kommt.Der Akku ist herausnehmbar, somit kann er auch außerhalb des Staubsaugers aufgeladen werden – im Automatikmodus gelingt eine komplette Wohnungssäuberung (100qm - ca. 45 min.), bei voller Leistung ist der Akku nach ca. 15 min. verbraucht. Seht hilfreich für die Leistungs- und Verbrauchskontrolle ist die große LED-Anzeige.Was will man zu einem TOP-Preis mehr.Klare Kaufempfehlung!

Ich habe mir diesen kabellosen Staubsauger als Ersatz für meinen alten, ebenfalls kabellosen Staubsauger gekauft, bei dem langsam die Akkuleistung nachgelassen hat. Der alte Staubsauger war in einem ähnlichen Preisbereich, jedoch schon 2 Jahre alt.Was ich nach bisheriger Benutzung über den neuen Staubsauger sagen kann:- Saugleistung: Wirklich spitze und wesentlich besser als beim Vorgänger.- Akku: Ebenfalls besser als beim Vorgänger, mal schauen wie er sich über die Zeit macht. Bei höchster Stufe hält er nicht die ganze Wohnung durch aber die höchste Stufe braucht man im Normalfall auch gar nicht- Bedienung: Geht wirklich leicht zu bedienen, auch dank des großen Displays auf dem man alle wichtigen Infos ablesen kann- Leerung: Ist easy möglich, einfach unten die Klappe öffnen und der Staub fällt herausBin mit dem Staubsauger soweit rundum zufrieden.

The media could not be loaded. I’m really not a strong person, so I appreciate how light this vacuum is! It’s perfect for a quick once-over before mopping, or to get spilled flour off the floor.For a really thorough vacuum, I have a larger machine with more power, but I don’t have to get it out nearly as often since I bought this one.

Er wurde schnell geliefert und direkt voll geladen. Er kam mit knapp 40 Prozent Akku und wurde auch gleich mal ausprobiert. Wichtig für uns: wir haben Tiere, Teppiche, laminat und Fliesen. Er kommt mit allem klar. Auf der schwächsten Stufe saugt er Problemlos über leichte Teppiche und Läufer ohne sie anzuziehen und nimmt trotzdem den Sxhmutz auf. Genauso gut läuft er auf den anderen Böden. Wir haben am nächsten Tag die ganze Wohnung gesaugt und alles auf der niedrigsten Stufe. Wenn man mal mehr Power braucht, schafft er das auch locker. Die Entleerung ist mit nur einem Klick super einfach und im Gegensatz zu Bosch etc., die wir im Geschäft ausprobiert haben , ist der 10 viel leichter und super wendig. Er fährt auch wirklich da lang, wo man hin will. Würde ich jederzeit wieder kaufen und für den Preis ist das wirklich mehr als fair!

Der Akkustaubsauger wird vorwiegend für Teppichboden benutzt, sehr wendig bei Ecken und Kanten. Als sehr positiv erweist sich mitgelieferter Schlauch, somit auch leichte Reinigung im Autoinnenraum.Einfache Klickverbindungen der Montageteile überzeugen. Bedienungsanleitung schwächelt etwas, dafürein aussagestarkes Video erhalten.
